item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. alphaXiv: Open research discussion on top of arXiv (356 points | 121 comments)
2. "Unstripping" binaries: Restoring debugging information in GDB with Pwndbg (7 points | 1 comment)
3. LibrePythonista allows running IPython code in a LibreOffice spreadsheet (78 points | 12 comments)
4. A Word, Please: Coffee-shop prompt stirs ChatGPT to brew up bland copy (27 points | 26 comments)
5. LuaJIT PR: Add Support for RISC-V 64 (73 points | 16 comments)
6. PC Floppy Copy Protection: Softguard Superlok (64 points | 18 comments)
7. Unconventional Case Study of Neoadjuvant Oncolytic Virotherapy for Breast Cancer (11 points | 1 comment)
8. Infisical (YC W23) Is Hiring a Developer Who Love Writing ( | hide)
9. Graphics Tricks from Boomers (16 points | discuss)
10. How a 16th Century Explorer's Sailing Ship Works (102 points | 27 comments)
11. Asking the wrong questions (2017) (165 points | 86 comments)
12. Ask HN: How does my school block DoH? (14 points | 10 comments)
13. WebP: The WebPage Compression Format (482 points | 170 comments)
14. Using rsync to create a limited ability to write remote files (7 points | 2 comments)
15. Cracking an old ZIP file to help open source the ANC's "Vula" secret crypto code (273 points | 27 comments)
16. Going Buildless (32 points | 14 comments)
17. Baiting the bot (101 points | 56 comments)
18. Concrete clickbait: next time you share a spomenik photo (2016) (103 points | 62 comments)
19. Ask HN: How do you share and sync .env files and secrets with your team (6 points | 7 comments)
20. Companies need junior devs (89 points | 70 comments)
21. Have ‘hobby’ apps become the new social networks? (146 points | 163 comments)
22. CitizenDJ – Make music using free audio and video from the Library of Congress (212 points | 14 comments)
23. Cruise ships chopped in half are a license to print money (228 points | 207 comments)
24. Keyhole – Forge own Windows Store licenses (592 points | 267 comments)
25. Microui+fenster=Small GUI (162 points | 17 comments)
26. htmx Web Security Basics (48 points | 13 comments)
27. Dogs can remember names of toys years after not seeing them, study shows (285 points | 156 comments)
28. A day in the life of the fastest supercomputer (28 points | 20 comments)
29. A new rare high-rank elliptic curve, and an orchard of Diophantine equations (191 points | 17 comments)
30. The "email is authentication" pattern (267 points | 373 comments)
